## Vector4.Distance() method

Returns the distance (float) between the vectors "value1" and "value2".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Distance(value1: ReadOnlyVector4, value2: ReadOnlyVector4): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value1 | <code>ReadOnlyVector4</code> | value to calulate the distance between |
|  value2 | <code>ReadOnlyVector4</code> | value to calulate the distance between |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the distance between the two vectors
